pullrequest.title: Convert copyright file to follow Debian DEP 5

content.raw:
For every instance of (license, copyright holder), you need a different section.
For instance:
- Copyright 2013, OSRF, Apache 2
- Copyright 2012-2013, OSRF, Apache 2
- Copyright 2013, OSRF, LGPL
- Copyright, 2013, Another Corp, Apache 2
...means 4 different sections (be careful regarding the copyright years and as you are upstream also consider
double checking them and making them uniform before the upstream release).
content.html: For every instance of (license, copyright holder), you need a different section. For instance: - Copyright 2013, OSRF, Apache 2 - Copyright 2012-2013, OSRF, Apache 2 - Copyright 2013, OSRF, LGPL - Copyright, 2013, Another Corp, Apache 2 ...means 4 different sections (be careful regarding the copyright years and as you are upstream also consider double checking them and making them uniform before the upstream release).
